channel.title: nginx on Myrat
channel.description: Recent content in nginx on Myrat

item.title: Centos7使用docker部署nginx并搭建hugo博客
item.description: 安装docker 参考菜鸟教程给服务器安装docker https://www.runoob.com/docker/centos-docker-install.html 下载nginx镜像 docker pull nginx:1.17.9 启动nginx容器 docker run --name blogNginx -d -p 80:80 -v {static-html-directory}:/usr/share/nginx/html nginx:1.17.9 static-html-
